text:
We (<https://grid.is/|GRID>) just launched an integration for HubSpot. Why would you need it?
• You want to put a calculator on your web site (e.g. ROI calculator, Mortgage calculator)
• You can, or already have, created a spreadsheet version of the calculator
• You want your visitors to have the option of filling out a contact form, after having used the calculator
• You want those visitors to become contacts/leads in HubSpot
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/lead-generation/grid-form-submissions>
